Detailed Description

Data class used to describe attributes of a data chunk.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ ChunkInfo() [1/2]

IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkInfo::ChunkInfo ( )

Initializes the object to be empty.

The following defaults are set:

Encrypted = false
Cipher ID = (empty string)
Key ID = (empty string)
Payload Start = 0
Payload Size = 0

◆ ChunkInfo() [2/2]

IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkInfo::ChunkInfo ( ISChunkCryptoChunkInfo &  chunkInfo)

Initializes the underlying unmanaged object.

Parameters
[in]chunkInfoUnmanaged ISChunkCryptoChunkInfo object.

Property Documentation

◆ CipherId

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkInfo::CipherId
getset

Determines the cipher ID of the data chunk.

If the ChunkInfo::Encrypted property is set to true, then this cipher ID represents the cipher ID that the data chunk is encrypted with. Otherwise, this cipher ID represents the cipher ID that is recommended to encrypt with.

◆ KeyId

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkInfo::KeyId
getset

The key ID that was used to encrypt the data chunk.

This field is only relevant if the encrypted property is set to true.

◆ PayloadSize

unsigned long IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkInfo::PayloadSize
getset

The size of the payload section of the data chunk.

This field is only relevant if the encrypted property is set to true.

◆ PayloadStart

unsigned long IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkInfo::PayloadStart
getset

The starting index of the payload section of the data chunk.

This field is only relevant if the encrypted property is set to true.
